languages.text: "Your parents, your... family. You never mention them."

traits.locale_text: "You never mention your family. Your parents."
"You never mention your family. Your parents."

languages.text: «Sus padres, su... familia. Nunca los ha mencionado».
languages.original_text: "Your parents, your... family. You never mention them."

traits.locale_text: «Sus padres, su... familia. Nunca los ha mencionado».

languages.text: 「両親や…家族のこと。お前は一度も口にしたことはないな」
languages.original_text: "Your parents, your... family. You never mention them."

traits.locale_text: 「両親や…家族のこと。お前は一度も口にしたことはないな」

languages.text: “你的父母，你的……家人。你从来没提起过这些人。”
languages.original_text: "Your parents, your... family. You never mention them."

traits.locale_text: “你的父母，你的……家人。你从来没提起过这些人。”

languages.text: "Eure Eltern, Eure ... Familie. Ihr erwähnt sie nie."
languages.original_text: "Your parents, your... family. You never mention them."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Eltern, Eure ... Familie. Ihr erwähnt sie nie."

languages.text: « Vos parents, votre... famille. Vous n'en parlez jamais. »
